summary: How do contracting officers know that the costs of products and services are fair and reasonable when they can't compare competing offers? They can use cost data, such as the cost of materials—or pricing information, such as invoices from the same or similar items. For contracts above a certain dollar threshold, contractors may be required to certify that the data is accurate, current, and complete...
title: Federal Contracting: Implementation of Changes to Cost or Pricing Data Requirements
